items.title: Create Your First Augmented Reality Experience

visible_instructors.title: Eswaran Mohan

visible_instructors.name: Eswaran

items.headline: Have you wondered on how does the famous Dog Filter was created? In this course, you will learn how to create one!
objectives_summary: In this course, you will learn on how to create your very first augmented reality experience (Lens) using Lens Studio. You will learn on how to create face filters that you normally use on social media such as the famous Dog Filter.
You will learn on how to create face filters that you normally use on social media such as the famous Dog Filter.
Throughout the course, you will be using Snapchat to experience those lenses that you create and share with your peers through other social media platform.

items.title: Basics of Animation on After Effects
items.headline: A basic course on animation on After Effects CC for beginners, with a step by step Animated Lower Third Project
objectives_summary: Students will gain the knowledge of how animation works in After Effects
Students will be able to create their own animated projects with elements, shapes or text
By the end of the course, students will be able to create professional lower third animations for videos with the help of a step by step project

items.title: Advanced Motion Graphics with After Effects Expressions
items.headline: Add various Professional effects | Automate tasks | Speed up your work | Get rid of repetitive keyframes
objectives_summary: You will learn how to write Expressions (JavaScript) to create various animations and motion graphics with After Effects.
You will also learn various functionalities that you can implement using expressions such as- Wiggle, Time, ValueAtTime, Math round.
You will learn how to create expressions for- Loop in and Loop out, Random, Gaussian Random, Length, If else, time delay and much more..
